alert.note: Alert for New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 5:58PM EDT until August 26 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN NEW LONDON COUNTY... At 558 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jewett City to near Bozrah to near East Hampton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, Colchester, Salem, Griswold, Lebanon, Preston, Lisbon, Sprague, Bozrah, Voluntown, Lake Pocotopaug--East Hampton, North Stonington and Franklin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
